name: Sogou Input Method
description: Sogou Input Method is a popular Chinese input method. It's characterized with functions of blurry pinyin, cloud input, automatic correction, colorful skin, long-term association, Simplified and Traditional switching.

en_US.description: Sogou Input Method is a popular Chinese input method. It's characterized with functions of blurry pinyin, cloud input, automatic correction, colorful skin, long-term association, Simplified and Traditional switching.
en_US.name: Sogou Input Method

zh_CN.description: 搜狗输入法是一款流行的中文输入法，它具有模糊拼音、云端输入、自动纠错、多彩皮肤、长词联想、简繁切换等功能。
zh_CN.name: 搜狗输入法
